1675100.name: AE86 EUROBEAT DRIFT
1675100.description:
AE86 EUROBEAT DRIFT is a risk-rewarding physics-based drifting game about collecting eurobeat tapes and escaping deadly saws. You will master the art of drifting, go through tons of obstacles and collect all the music tapes so people hear how good music sounds.


â€¢ Fast-paced gameplay.
â€¢ Funky car physics without brakes.
â€¢ Unique aestheticğ–ˆ.
â€¢ Minimalist artstyle.
â€¢ 30 handcrafted hardcore levels.
â€¢ Original eurobeat soundtrack.
